scripts.testonly: cross-env-shell "npx cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/test/hooks/**/*.ts --require src/test/steps/**/*.ts --format json:reports/cucumber_report.json --format rerun:@rerun.txt || exit 0"
scripts.test: npm run clean:reports && npm run testonly && npm run posttest
scripts.test:failed: npx cucumber-js @rerun.txt --require-module ts-node/register --require src/test/hooks/**/*.ts --require src/test/steps/**/*.ts --format json:reports/failed_report.json
